channel.title: Ummm
channel.description:
http://www.ky3.com/news/ky3-test-turns-to-humiliation-for-kindergartner-20120417,0,5460268.story It's a local story
I don't even know what to say

item.title: Ummm
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“kronixz, post:4, topic:439934”]teachers… fuck you. (unless u jaba techer)

and lol shes like "theres poop… POOP DIAREA coming out of her bottom[/quote]I am a licensed teacher in the state of Georgia we aren’t all THAT bad.

I agree with Mr. Walker. It should had been handled differently. From a parental standpoint I would tell my little girl before she even went to the school in the first place, "If you need to go and the teacher says no, leave the room anyway. "

A teacher by LAW cannot stop a child it’s a known fact in the education field. The whole entire “tardy” and “absent” system is all curricula requirements and school board regulations. But if you was to take it to court all charges would be dropped as the student holds all rights in a public setting.

Remember, YOU THE PARENT PAYS the TEACHER.

This while off topic is something I feel like I should also state…when a parent is told that their child is too “slow” for the regular education class guess what. YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO SAY NO to special education.

Read full topic
